alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 10:25PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT MONDAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Illinois, including the following county, Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 430 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1024 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported flooding across portions of northeastern Montgomery county from thunderstorms. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - No additional rainfall is expected tonight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nokomis, Coalton, Ohlman and Wenonah.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
